title: Registered Nurse (US-Licensed) – Remote – Full-Time, Long-Term Opportunity
job_overview:
Needs to hire 2 Freelancers
Summary
Location: Fully Remote

Schedule: Monday - Friday, 9 AM - 5:00 PM, 40 hours per week (Time zone flexibility required) PST or CST or  EST

About the Role:

We are actively seeking a dedicated and compassionate Clinician must be US RN  to join our remote healthcare team. This position requires a highly skilled professional who can provide superior patient care, education, and communication virtually.

Key Responsibilities:

Deliver virtual patient education on vitals and lifestyle modifications.
Monitor patient vital signs remote and report any significant changes or concerns.
Foster open and effective communication with patients, their families, and the healthcare team.
Coordinate with medical practitioners, reporting patient updates and escalating concerns as required.
Maintain detailed and accurate patient records, documenting treatment plans, progress, and any observed complications.

Qualifications:

Medical Education US RN License
Exceptional verbal and written communication skills in English.
Proficient in using electronic health record systems.
Ability to work independently with a high degree of reliability and performance quality.

Application Instructions:

Interested applicants are requested to apply with a current resume, 2-min video introduction detailing your relevant experience and skills. Please note that this position is 100% remote, and candidates must be available to work the specified hours in line with U.S. business hours.
